title: Confluence and MIRO integration
lock_explanation: This topic is closed for comments.
message:
OPTION 1: Adding boards to Confluence pages

Now you can add your Miro boards to your Confluence pages. To do that:

  1. Click More apps and choose Miro on your list:
    Miro plugin on the list of additional content options

  2. You will see a simple version of your dashboard.
    ⚠️ When opening the board picker a user only sees the boards available to them on the Miro side. 

    Plugin board picker

  3. Click the board you need or find it via the Search option and then choose the sharing level you wish to set:

    Sharing levels available

✏️ To be able to see the boards on the Confluence pages a Confluence user does not necessarily need to be registered with Miro. If a Confluence user has access to the Confluence page, then they will see the board.

⚠️ Note that the plugin for Server and Cloud differs in the window size menu controls.

Cloud will show the following menu with Stretch-to-Width option:

While Server will look like this, with S/M/L options: 

 

OPTION2: Atlassian Smart Link for Miro

You can embed Miro boards into Confluence using the Atlassian Smart Link feature. The feature allows you to automatically embed a board without the need to install a plugin.

✏️ Please note that only those users who have access to the embedded board on the Miro's side will be able to work with the preview after connecting their Miro and Atlassian accounts. If you'd like to make the preview available for all Confluence users, feel free to use the Miro plugin.

Go to a Confluence page and simply paste a board link or type /link to insert. If you use the feature for the first time, you will be asked to connect your Miro account. Click Connect to preview, authorize in Miro, and choose a team from which you will embed your boards. 


Choosing a team to embed boards from 

When you paste a Miro board's link into a Confluence page, it will turn into a Confluence widget automatically. Click the link and you will see the options to display the link as a card or as an embed.


The options to display a Miro board link as a link, card, or embed 

If you choose to display the board as an embed, you can change the embed size by dragging its side.


Changing Miro embed size in Confluence

 

⚠️ If third-party cookies are blocked in your browser there can be unexpected issues displaying embedded boards.

If any issues arise please refer to our article about Possible Atlassian Issues and How to Resolve them.

title: Motivational Modelling tool
lock_explanation: This topic is closed for comments.
message:
Register here: https://momo-swen90009.eresearch.unimelb.edu.au/ (every one must register to the tool)

Please list your logins here (one post per group).

 

Follow this format:

Team <Two Digits> <Animal>:

- login1, login2, login3 and so on (list all the logins from all the team members)

 

Example:

Team CA Koala

- abc, bcd, cde, def, efg.

Only one post per team.

 

Thank you very much!

title: Week 1: Forming Project Teams
lock_explanation: This topic is closed for comments.
message:
This forum is to help you form project teams.

Please read the team formation instructions on Qualtrics (Link: https://melbourneuni.au1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_0cF91xlC8iQKsRM Password: SWEN90009_2021) carefully before posting here. Your deadline to submit a team is March 7 11.59pm.

You can post here to promote yourself to find a team, or promote your team here to try and find additional members.

title: Any feedback on what worked for you or what can be improved in this subject?
message:
I highly appreciate your time sharing a few words with me.

My goal is to improve this subject and students' experience every year.

 

If you have 5 minutes, can you please let me know:

- anything that worked well for you in this subject?

- what did you enjoy the most?

- anything that can be improved in the subject?

- general comments/ideas?

 

Thank you very much!
